q: ( Reuters)- Chrysler is working to refinance what its chief executive characterized as`` shyster loans'' that the Barack Obama administration extended as part of a bailout to keep the automaker from collapse in 2009. I want to pay back the shyster loans, Sergio Marchionne said at an industry conference, using a derogatory term for an unprincipled lawyer or politician.`` Pay back the loans, get those out and then take( the company) public.'' But making use of white spaces will require some coordination, so that upcoming TV band wireless networking devices don't interfere with licensed TV band users like broadcast television stations. political operatives say he must do if he hopes to be re-elected.`` The jury is still out on which way the Bill Clinton is going to go,'' said Greg Mueller , a Republican political strategist. Will he continue to draw lines in the sand far to the left of the electorate or is he going to lurch to the middle the way Bill Clinton did to see if he can come back? The State of the Union is the kickoff of his re-election campaign. `` For a Democratic Bill Clinton to win, you have to move to the center,'' said Mike Pence Martin, a Democratic operative from Missouri.`` This country is not ready for a pure progressive.
